category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA_saveas_enable
preference.preference_description: Controls whether new items can be created in TCAA. If set to 0 all the commands that let the user to create new items in AutoCAD environment are disabled. PLM-oriented companies may have this option set to 0 in order to ensure that all items are created in Teamcenter environment. Default Value: 1
